articles.title: Scientists prepare CERN collider restart in hunt for "dark matter" - CNA
articles.description: PREVESSIN, France :     Scientists at Europe's physics research centre will this week fire up the 27 kilometer-long Large Hadron Collider (LHC), the machine that found the Higgs boson particle, after a shutdown for maintenance and upgrades was prolonged by CO…

articles.author: Abe Asher
articles.title: Mysterious liver disease affecting children in the UK spreads to the US - The Independent
articles.description: The disease, first identified in the UK, has now sickened children in the US and Europe
articles.content:
A new liver disease first identified in the United Kingdom is now affecting children in both the United States and Europe.
